00021         and will prove much more flexible in the long run, thanks for
00022         understanding.

00025         "Header Search Paths" found under your Target Info->Build area.

00081 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00082 {
00083         
00084 @protected
00085         /* our chipmunk space! */
00086         cpSpace *_space;
00087         
00088         /* Internal devices (dev: Consider revamping) */
00089         NSMutableArray *_invocations;
00090 
00091         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00092         cpShape *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00093         
00094         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00095         int     _steps;
00096         
00097         /* The dt used last within step */
00098         cpFloat _lastDt;
00099         
00100         /* If constant dt used, then this accumulates left over */
00101         cpFloat _timeAccumulator;
00102                 
00103         /* Options:
00104                 -cleanupBodyDependencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00105                 -constraintCleanupDelegate is the delegate that will be called when the above variable is true
00106                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00107                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00108                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00109         */
00110         BOOL                                                    _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00111         id<cpConstraintCleanupDelegate> _constraintCleanupDelegate;
00112         BOOL                                                    _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00113         smgrIterateFunc                 _iterateFunc;
00114     smgrEachFunc                    _eachFunc;
00115         cpFloat                                                 _constantDt;
00116 }
00117
